SEARCH
Package com.magenta.persistence.repository

Interface AppointmentRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<AppointmentEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<AppointmentEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<AppointmentEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<AppointmentEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<AppointmentEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<AppointmentEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<AppointmentEntity,Long>
@Repository public interface AppointmentRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<AppointmentEntity,Long>
Repositorio para gestionar las citas.

  • Method Details

    • findOverlappingAppointments

      @Query("SELECT a FROM AppointmentEntity a WHERE a.appointmentDateTime BETWEEN :startTime AND :endTime") List<AppointmentEntity> findOverlappingAppointments(LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)

    • findAllByMonthAndYear

      @Query("SELECT a FROM AppointmentEntity a WHERE MONTH(a.appointmentDateTime) = :month AND YEAR(a.appointmentDateTime) = :year") List<AppointmentEntity> findAllByMonthAndYear(int month, int year)

    • findByUserUsername

      List<AppointmentEntity> findByUserUsername(String username)

    • countActiveAppointmentsByUsername

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(a) FROM AppointmentEntity a WHERE a.user.username = :username AND a.status IN (:activeStatuses)") long countActiveAppointmentsByUsername(@Param("username") String username, @Param("activeStatuses") List<AppointmentStatus> activeStatuses)

    • existsOverlappingAppointmentForUser

      @Query("SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(a) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END FROM AppointmentEntity a WHERE a.user.username = :username AND a.appointmentDateTime BETWEEN :startTime AND :endTime AND a.status <> \'CANCELLED\'") boolean existsOverlappingAppointmentForUser(@Param("username") String username, @Param("startTime") LocalDateTime startTime, @Param("endTime") LocalDateTime endTime)
